title: Beneath The Surface
description:
What lies between the walls of a house, inside the eyes of a toy, or beneath someone’s skin can often be more than we bargained for. If we’re not careful, we can fall victim to other presences that watch and wait to strike when we’re most vulnerable. Always be wary of what lurks just beneath the surface of things. First, a doll just wants a new friend to play with. And then, a home that houses the eternal battle of good vs evil. Followed by the true story of toys that can eat children. And finally, a tale of imaginary sisters.
Use coupon code “SCARY” for $10 off your first box at www.fabfitfun.com. That’s coupon code “SCARY” for $10 off your first box at www.fabfitfun.com
